posts.message:
For who are interested in Internet of Things, here's a blog post on how to control a servo motor connect to a raspberry pi with a UWP Application (Windows 10 IoT Core).

Your feedback is highly appreciated :D 

Share it with your community ;)

#Windows10 #IoT #RaspberryPi
posts.caption: hackster.io
posts.description: This tutorial will show you how to control a servo motor with a UWP App installed on a raspberry pi 2 running windows 10 IoT core. By Mohamed Emam.

posts.message: Anyone has experience with SMS services to send and receive SMSs internationally. I see many related topics on stackoverflow, but most of them is in unreasonable prices for US and Canda , I want to know the options in Egypt and Middle east area.

مشروع جديد بقى جزء من GNU مهمته انه يكون Free Neural network، المكتوب جوة ان النتائج اللى طلعت من الفا جو و من واطسون كانت مبهرة بس فكرة ان التكنولوجيا تكون حكر على الشركات بس مش فكرة كويسة و بتبطآ تطوير التكنولوجى دى ولو فيه بديل فرى هيكون السباق اسرع، الباكدج لسة نازلة و دى النواة.
posts.caption: gnu.org
posts.description: Gneural Network is the GNU package which implements a programmable neural network. In the current release, version 0.0.1, it is a very simple feedforward network which can learn very simple tasks such as curve fitting, but we plan to deliver more advanced features very soon. when i make train File in arabic i got a lot of "Dropped event"
is that ok , or i'm Doing some thing wrong ?

Hi, I'm designing a secure instant-messaging p2p network currently and i want to know if their any approaches to reach a really secure program using cryptography algorithms ( rsa, des, aes .. ) so the messages will be secured from known attacks.

Any suggestions ???

Note: I do not need some codes or instructions to generate cryptography algorithms or how to use them.
